item.title: Internal Approaches Blockchain Database Technology Strategies
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure William Mougayar, The Business Blockchain - Moderator Edward Budd, Deutsche Bank Ian Lee, Citi Ventures Scott Manuel, Thomson Reuters Bart Suichies, Philips Jeremy Wilson, Barclays JW: Matthew Bishop’s panel yesterday divided the universe into three broad categories. This seems to be the way these things work out. You get the newcomer who realy gets it right and gets very big. Then you get in the case particuarly, which is what wer’e talking about right here, which is the financia srevices industry, you get the incumbents or the people who are already doing business who realize there needs to be a change.
